nodes.text: The Ethrani system was a star system located within the Valahari sector, a part of the D'Astan sector of the Outer Rim Territories and the New Territories. It was home to a creature known as the Ethrani ourobouros.
The Ethrani system was established in the StarWars.com Online Companion to the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, which placed the system in grid square N-5.
